Package agend932

Class DatabaseHandler

java.lang.Object
agend932.DatabaseHandler
public class DatabaseHandler
extends Object
This class serves as the database handler for the Metacritic Scraper application. It provides functionality to establish database connections, execute queries, and manage database tables.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private DataSource dataSource  

  • Constructor Summary

    Initializes a new DatabaseHandler object.

    Drops the specified tables from the database.

  • Field Details

    • dataSource

      private DataSource dataSource

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseHandler

      public DatabaseHandler()
      Initializes a new DatabaseHandler object. It sets up the DataSource by looking up the JNDI context. It is assumed that the DataSource is configured with the name "jdbc/DatabaseConnectionConfiguration" in the web server context. This DataSource is then used to provide database connections throughout the application.

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      private Connection getConnection()
      Obtains a database connection from the configured DataSource. This method is used internally to acquire connections for executing SQL operations.
      Returns:
      A Connection object to interact with the database, or null if a connection cannot be established.

    • doesTableExist

      private boolean doesTableExist​(String tableName, Connection con) throws SQLException
      Checks if a specific table exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table to check.
      con - The database connection to use.
      Returns:
      True if the table exists, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error executing the query.

    • createTableIfNotExists

      private void createTableIfNotExists​(String tableName, Connection con) throws SQLException
      Creates a new table in the database if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table to create.
      con - The database connection to use.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error creating the table.

    • saveResultsToDB

      public void saveResultsToDB​(String tableName, List<Media> mediaList, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Saves a list of media entries to the specified table in the database.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table where the media will be stored.
      mediaList - A list of Media objects to be saved to the database.
      response - The HttpServletResponse object used for error handling.

    • simpleQuery

      public void simpleQuery​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Executes a simple query on the database for demonstration purposes and sends the results back to the client.
      Parameters:
      response - The HttpServletResponse object that contains the response the servlet sends to the client.

    • fetchAllData

      public List<Media> fetchAllData​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Fetches all media data from the database and returns it as a list.
      Parameters:
      response - The HttpServletResponse object used for error handling.
      Returns:
      A list of Media objects containing all the media data from the database.

    • fetchFilteredData

      public List<Media> fetchFilteredData​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, String searchKeyword, String mediaType, String platform, String genre, String sortOption, Integer minMetascore, Integer maxMetascore, String beforeYear, String afterYear)
      Fetches filtered media data based on provided search criteria and returns it as a list.
      Parameters:
      response - The HttpServletResponse object used for error handling.
      searchKeyword - The keyword to filter by the title.
      mediaType - The media type to filter by.
      platform - The platform to filter by.
      genre - The genre to filter by.
      sortOption - The sorting option for the results.
      minMetascore - The minimum metascore for filtering results.
      maxMetascore - The maximum metascore for filtering results.
      beforeYear - The year before which the media was released for filtering results.
      afterYear - The year after which the media was released for filtering results.
      Returns:
      A list of Media objects containing the filtered media data from the database.

    • dropTables

      public void dropTables()
      Drops the specified tables from the database.

    • handleError

      private void handleError​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, String message)
      Handles errors by sending a response message to the client.
      Parameters:
      response - The HttpServletResponse object that contains the response the servlet sends to the client.
      message - The message to be sent to the client.
